attributes.action: Live on minimum wage for a period of 2 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the primeminister and ascoiates should live on Minimum wage for a period of 2 months, this way they will know what it is like to live on the "poverty line". And maybe they will do something about the so called tax/working credits, And maybe raise the minimmum wage to coinside with inflation. 
A quick example, myself gained a 2.5% payrise this year but the rate of inflation has gone up 17%. Now seeing that my outgoings were more than my monthly wage before my payris and inflation, it dosent look that good for the future.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
